column5: Map of Gondolin showing the '''Arch of Inwë''' on the west side of the Square of the Folkwell]]

column1: The '''Arch of Inwë''' was the western entrance to the [[Place of the Well]] in [[Gondolin]].  The origin of its name, concerning [[Ingwë#Other versions of the legendarium
column2: Inwë]], is unknown as it is only mentioned once.<ref>{{LT2
